content: कर्परः {@--1@} An iron sauce-pan, a frying-pan. {@--2@} A pot or vessel in general (as of a potter). {@--3@} A potsherd, piece of a broken jar; as in घटकर्पर; जीयेय येन कबिना यमकैः परेण तस्मै वहेयमुदकं घटकर्परेण <ls>Ghaṭ. 22.</ls> {@--4@} The skull. {@--5@} A kind of weapon. {@--6@} A back-bone; <ls>Māl. 5. 22.</ls>
